attributes.action: Give Manchester City £100m to buy a striker or two.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Manchester City are a professional football club in the North West of England, who are currently SKINT.  We're desperate for a striker and haven't managed to get one in the transfer window as we've no money, please give us £100m to help the manager out, in return I'm sure you'd be guaranteed 40000 votes for the next election.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
